versions.prompt: Create a simple login form with email and password fields and a submit button
versions.code:
import React from 'react';
import type { Meta, StoryObj } from '@storybook/react';
import { Card, TextInput, PasswordInput, Button, Stack, Title, Text, Anchor } from '@mantine/core';

const meta = {
  title: 'Generated/Login Form - Email and Password',
  parameters: {
    layout: 'centered',
  },
} satisfies Meta;

export default meta;
type Story = StoryObj<typeof meta>;

export const Default: Story = {
  render: () => (
    <Card shadow="sm" padding="lg" radius="md" withBorder style={{ width: 400 }}>
      <Stack gap="md">
        <Title order={2}>Welcome Back</Title>
        <Text size="sm" c="dimmed">
          Sign in to your account to continue
        </Text>
        
        <TextInput
          label="Email"
          placeholder="your@email.com"
          required
        />
        
        <PasswordInput
          label="Password"
          placeholder="Enter your password"
          required
        />
        
        <Button fullWidth mt="md">
          Sign In
        </Button>
        
        <Text size="sm" ta="center" c="dimmed">
          Don't have an account? <Anchor href="#">Sign up</Anchor>
        </Text>
      </Stack>
    </Card>
  ),
};

export const WithError: Story = {
  render: () => (

      <Stack gap="md">
        <Title order={2}>Welcome Back</Title>
        <Text size="sm" c="dimmed">
          Sign in to your account to continue
        </Text>
        
        <TextInput
          label="Email"
          placeholder="your@email.com"
          error="Invalid email address"
          required
        />
        
        <PasswordInput
          label="Password"

          error="Password is required"
          required

        <Button fullWidth mt="md">

        </Button>
        
        <Text size="sm" ta="center" c="dimmed">

        </Text>

  ),
};
